column1: Definition: This indicator shows the gross amount of green bonds issuance in USD
column2: categorized as government and corporates. FCY-denominated bonds refer to bonds issued in currencies other than the home economy's currency. Green bonds are debt instruments whose proceeds will be used for the financing of environmental or climate-related projects.
